honeywell.connection

Class Connection_TCP

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • honeywell.connection.ConnectionBase
        • honeywell.connection.Connection_TCP
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Connection_TCP
extends ConnectionBase
    This is the class for TCP type connections. The Transfer Control Protocol(TCP) sends its data grams to the target device and does guarantee reliable and in-order delivery. Because of this it is much slower than UDP so is used when accurate data is more important than speed.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class honeywell.connection.ConnectionBase

      • getRemoteEnd

        public java.lang.String getRemoteEnd()
        This will return the IP of the other end.
        Returns:

      • createClient

        public static Connection_TCP createClient(java.lang.String targetDevice,
                                          int port)
                                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Create a TCP client connection. This function is used to create a connection to a TCP server.
        Parameters:
        targetDevice - IP or address of target address.
        port - Port number to connect on.
        Returns:
        Connection object that can be used to talk to the device.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Error caused by invalid IP Address format

      • createClient

        public static Connection_TCP createClient(java.lang.String targetDevice,
                                          int port,
                                          boolean isAsync)
                                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Create a TCP client connection. This function is used to create a connection to a TCP server.
        Parameters:
        targetDevice - IP or address of target address.
        port - Port number to connect on.
        isAsync - Will this Connection run asynchronously (multi-threaded)
        Returns:
        Connection object that can be used to talk to the device.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Error caused by invalid IP Address format

      • createServer

        public static Connection_TCP createServer(int port)
                                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Create a TCP server connection. This function is used to create a connection which will listen for incoming TCP clients.
        Parameters:
        port - Port number to connect on.
        Returns:
        Connection object that can be used to talk to the device.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Error caused by invalid IP Address format
